body_html:
@cableyang,

I'm here. I notice you are in CN region, we have active forum here.
https://www.tensorflowers.cn/

As for knowledge discussion, I would prefer you go to forum or mail list. Github issues are more for tracking feature requests, issues etc.

I'm here. I notice you are in CN region, we have active forum here.

As for knowledge discussion, I would prefer you go to forum or mail list. Github issues are more for tracking feature requests, issues etc.
